The dolls all around you seem to slowly awake. <<if $venusHelp>>\ <<pcdia "whitedoll_mark" ">>Shit, I need to hurry.<<">> <<else>>\ <<pcdia "easyfrown" ">>Shit, I need to hurry.<<">> <</if>>\ You make your next steps as carefully and yet as quickly as possible. You can access it via the button on the sidebar: <img class="centerBorderless" src="media/icons/quests.png"/> In the quest log you can find your active quests. You can expand the quest by click on its title. It shows you then the current status of the quest: <img class="centerBorderless" src="media/whatsnew/questlog.png"/> At the moment you can only find one side quest.
